title: Microbial Water Quality Analysis
description: Comprehensive investigation of microbial contamination levels in urban water sources, employing membrane filtration and coliform enumeration techniques to assess public health risks.

title: Antibiotic Susceptibility Testing
description: Laboratory investigation utilizing disc diffusion and broth microdilution methods to evaluate emerging antibiotic resistance patterns in clinical bacterial isolates from hospital settings.

title: Microbial Genetics Fundamentals
description: Academic exploration of bacterial genetic mechanisms including plasmid-mediated gene transfer, mutation analysis, and regulatory pathways in prokaryotic systems.
